mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve_info (user_id, book_id, reserve_time, borrow_time, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bookId}, #{reserveTime}, #{borrowTime}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, book_id, reserve_time, borrow_time, status, create_time, update_time,user_name,book_title FROM reserve_info

select * from reserve_info
and user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and book_title like concat('%',#{bookTitle},'%')
